{"title": "Reddit in uproar after staff sacking", "pstUrl": "http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-33379571#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa", "summary": "[\"Social news site Reddit is in virtual lockdown in protest over the sacking of popular employee Victoria Taylor.\", \"Ms Taylor said she was \\\"dazed\\\" by the swiftness of her departure in a very brief response to a message asking her about the sacking.\", \"Reddit staff were \\\"being uncommunicative, and disregarding the thousands of moderators who keep the site running\\\", they said.\", \"Ms Taylor helped organise guests for AMAs and worked to verify that people due to answer questions were who they said they were.\", \"\\\"We all had the rug ripped out from under us and feel betrayed,\\\" said one of the AMA moderators in a separate message.\"]"}

{"title": "Minecraft fans to gather in London", "pstUrl": "http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-33379577#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa", "summary": "[\"Minecon, the global gathering for fans of the video game Minecraft, takes place in London this weekend.\", \"The convention will also feature a \\\"speedrun\\\" competition to see which players can traverse a Minecraft game map the fastest.\", \"The core coding team for Minecraft is set to appear at the show to talk about future features on which they are working.\", \"Also present will be Telltale Games which is working on Minecraft: Story Mode - an episodic adventure set in the game's universe.\", \"This year's convention is the first since Microsoft bought Minecraft maker Mojang for $2.5bn (\\u00a31.6bn) in September 2014.\"]"}

{"title": "VIDEO: ZX Spectrum remake nears completion", "pstUrl": "http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-33379468#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa", "summary": "[\"Fans of the ZX Spectrum's spongy keyboard are one step closer to typing on it again.\", \"The new keyboard can be connected to a tablet computer with Bluetooth and used to control retro gaming apps.\", \"Mr Wilcox said the company had the necessary licence to use the ZX Spectrum name and the software it was offering in the keyboard's companion app.\", \"A majority of the computing is done by the tablet, not the keyboard.\", \"He said the project had been delayed after the team decided to support Android tablets as well as Apple's iOS devices.\"]"}

{"title": "Lawsuit over Samsung phone software", "pstUrl": "http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-33379575#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa", "summary": "[\"A Chinese consumer protection group launched the legal action over the default apps or \\\"bloatware\\\" found on Samsung phones.\", \"The council said it was motivated to start the legal action following a growing number of complaints about pre-installed apps.\", \"In a statement, Samsung said: \\\"We have not yet received the formal complaint filed by the Shanghai Consumer Council.\", \"The legal action aims to make the two phone-makers put in place systems that let people remove the apps easily and warn them about what they get when they buy a new phone.\", \"The Shanghai Consumer Council also filed a similar case against Chinese phone-maker Oppo.\"]"}

{"title": "EE fined \u00a31m for complaints handling", "pstUrl": "http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-33376678#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa", "summary": "[\"EE, the UK's largest mobile phone operator, has been fined \\u00a31m by the regulator Ofcom for breaching rules on handling customer complaints.\", \"The investigation into EE is part of Ofcom's wider look at complaints handling by telecoms companies.\", \"The fine imposed against EE takes account of the serious failings that occurred in the company's complaints handling, and the extended period over which these took place.\\\"\", \"Ofcom's current figures highlight that complaints into Ofcom about EE have fallen by 50% in the past year.\\\"\", \"Ofcom point that the 50% figure relates solely to complaints about mobile services, but that complaints about EE broadband and landlines services have actually risen by 50% and 30% respectively.\"]"}

{"title": "Trump hotels examine card breach claim", "pstUrl": "http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-33364354#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa", "summary": "[\"Donald Trump's hotel business is investigating claims that it is the latest US firm to fall victim to a credit and debit card security breach.\", \"If the fears were confirmed, the Trump Organization would become the latest in a series of US firms to be the victim of a credit and debit card breach.\", \"What each of the cases reportedly had in common was that the associated credit and debit cards had all previously been used at Trump hotels.\", \"The claims brought concerns about the security of US credit cards to the fore.\", \"Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Las Vegas said in May that a malware attack may have allowed hackers to steal information about credit cards used at its locations.\"]"}

{"title": "Amnesty demands GCHQ spying inquiry", "pstUrl": "http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-33370406#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa", "summary": "[\"\\\"The revelation that the UK government has been spying on Amnesty International highlights the gross inadequacies in the UK's surveillance legislation.\\\"\", \"It came after the Investigatory Powers Tribunal (IPT) informed Amnesty that GCHQ had breached rules by keeping data intercepted from it for too long - although it had been collected legally.\", \"Campaign group Amnesty International has called for an independent inquiry after it was confirmed it was spied on by British surveillance agency GCHQ.\\n\\nIt said it was \\\"outrageous\\\" that human rights bodies were being monitored.\", \"The tribunal had said in June that GCHQ failed to delete data intercepted from two other rights groups on time.\", \"The tribunal has now made it clear that it was Amnesty and not the Egyptian organisation that had been spied on.\"]"}

{"title": "Facebook to pay video clip creators", "pstUrl": "http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-33362722#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa", "summary": "[\"Facebook is to start paying some video creators for uploading their clips to the platform.\", \"One likely concern for video creators is that it is more difficult to search for videos on Facebook than YouTube at the moment.\", \"\\\"Based on our forecasts, by 2018 Facebook will have 25% of online video ad revenue in Europe, and more in the US,\\\" said Ms Marouli.\", \"While YouTube gives content creators 55% of the revenue from ads displayed before their videos, Facebook will split the 55% it is offering between several creators.\", \"Facebook made $3.3bn (\\u00a32.1bn) in ad revenue in the first quarter of 2015, 73% of it from mobile ads.\"]"}

{"title": "Rise in nuisance call complaints", "pstUrl": "http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-33362726#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa", "summary": "[\"The UK's Information Commissioner's Office (ICO) received a record number of complaints about nuisance calls in the past year.\", \"The watchdog said 180,188 complaints about unwanted promotional calls and text messages had been made, up 11% from last year.\", \"Overall, the ICO issued more than \\u00a31m in fines in the last year.\", \"The total number of complaints the ICO handled fell slightly compared with last year.\", \"The organisation said its research showed only 2% of people who received unwanted calls reported them.\"]"}

{"title": "VIDEO: Robot suit lets paralysed soldier walk", "pstUrl": "http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-33369732#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa", "summary": "[\"A former British soldier who was paralysed in Afghanistan is learning how to walk again with the help of an exoskeleton.\", \"James Johnson, who served with the Grenadier Guards, is the first paraplegic person to be part of the Salford University pilot scheme to teach people how to walk using robotics.\", \"In the past two years, exoskeletons have started to be sold commercially but they are expensive.\", \"The ReWalk system being used by Mr Johnson costs \\u20ac60,000 ($66,541, \\u00a342,850).\", \" The company hopes insurance firms will help others with similar disabilities meet the cost of learning to walk again.\"]"}
